content: this watermelon bag crochet pattern features linked crochet stitches and tips such that even a beginner can crochet it this free crochet pattern is made with acrylic worsted-weight yarn and includes 3 detailed video tutorials **the pattern is free with ads on my website ** > but you can also purchase the pdf here > or purchase the linked crochet ebook > which includes 40 patterns and many video tutorials > here 1 > this pattern can also be > found in my crochet membership which > includes over 400 patterns and > 100s of video tutorials you can join > the membership here 2 1 https //nickinhc--nickishomemadecrafts thrivecart com/linked-crochet-made-easy/ ref=ravelry 2 https //www nickishomemadecrafts com/crochet/the-crochet-club/
